data.text: @dhowarrdd Hello Danielle! We're truly sorry to hear about the inconvenience you have experienced while traveling with us. If you are in need of further assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@scottebeling Hi Scott! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@Wh0SaidDat Hello! Once checked in, you are unable to make modifications to a reservation. If you would like for a member of our team to review your flight details, please send us a DM. -JH

@cathrsis1 Hey JJ! You can check your flight status online once you are within 24 hours of your departure at https://t.co/q5gkyr8Bt1. We also recommend signing up for text flight alerts so you can be notified of any changes to your flight status. -JH

urls.title: Check Flight Status | Allegiant Flight Information
urls.description: Up-to-the-minute Allegiant flight status. Search by departure date, departure and arrival airport or flight number.

data.text: @NickyDonnie_ Hi there! Allegiant welcomes all passengers for transport and does not condone discrimination in any form. Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your experience so that we may look into this situation. - C

@connorgrieb We're sorry to hear this, Connor. Please keep in mind, once checked in, you are unable to make modifications to a reservation. If you would like for a team member to review your flight details, we welcome you to send us a DM. -JH

@klrswilliams We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a representative over the phone. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we assist each caller in the order they contact us. - C

@klrswilliams Hi there Karen! If you have an air-only reservation, there is no need to hold. We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. If your reservation contains a hotel or rental car, you will have to call in. - C

data.text: @ShannonWAVENews Hi Shannon! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. You are also welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you have general questions or concerns. - C
@bellaroona_ We're sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@Burnku Hi Brett! We're so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. - C
@TheHotDogHorse Hey Connor! If in need of assistance, please send us a DM and a member of our team would be happy to review. -JH
@jojodiva33 We show you have sent us a DM for assistance, thanks for reaching out. -JH
@HeidiLiebi Hi there Heidi! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help you in any way we can ASAP. - C

@Kendall1810 Hi Kendall! We're sorry to hear about this. We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. We do have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take calls in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. - C

@SalOcello Hi there! If you are seeking information regarding a specific flight, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the flight details. A member of our team will be happy to look into it for you ASAP. - C

@AppelhansGay Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and we will be happy to direct you to the appropriate department. - C
@fdesilva Hey Federico! We see you have sent us a DM for assistance, thank you! -JH

@keepitclassy87 Hi Elissa! Thanks for reaching out with this question. Our records indicate that today's flight 906 with service from USA to PIE has been delayed 2 minutes. The flight is now estimated to depart at 3:21 PM and is estimated to arrive at 4:59 PM. - C
@PappaCoop Hi John! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details. - C

@AtlToMemphis Hi Sean! Unfortunately, we will not be adding any flights to any of our routes between now and mid-November. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@joshcunningham Hi Josh! We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in service with us today. If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@ItsNikkiCole We are so sorry to hear of your canceled flight and for any frustration. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM and a member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -JH
@SallyAMcHugh We are very sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@_camillions Hi Cami, we are very sorry to hear about your frustrations. If you are in need of any assistance, please feel free to send us a DM and we would be happy to review your flight details. -Nicole

data.text: @Mike38241260 Hey Mike! We do apologize for any hold time. Please feel free to send us a PM if in need of assistance. -JH
@KateJacksonVA Hi Kate! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@KateJacksonVA Our apologies for the any hold time. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@phs_mrsabba Our apologies for any hold time. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. A member of our team would be happy to help in any way possible. -JH
@ButtahPCan Hi Ariana! You are welcome to cancel and rebook the flight. We do not offer price adjustments. - GM

urls.title: Pet Travel | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

data.text: @slopezm88 Hi Santiago! If in need of assistance, please send us a DM so that a member of our team can review your flight details. -JH
@drjonmusic Sending happy/healthy vibes your way!!! -JH 🙏 💝
@DaanHag12 Hey Dan! Our records show you have sent us a PM for assistance. Thank you for your patience. -JH
@differentwrld_ Hi there! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@kizichild @goodaytonflyers We see you sent a DM and it has been responded to. Thanks for your patience. - GM
Shout out to all of our team members who work hard behind the scenes to make sure we keep #GoingTheDistance. 👏👏 https://t.co/sl9aB2xWcw

@JENET3 Hi there Jenet! We are saddened to learn that the service provided by our team members did not meet you expectations. If you are in need of assistance or wish to discuss this further, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - C

@Maxwell32 Hi Maxwell! The only way to process your desired modification is by calling in to our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call. There is a hold time when seeking to speak to a rep over the phone. - C

@thesarahgracie Hi Sarah! Check out our Deals page on our official website here: https://t.co/KBsfa27bKj
You can calculate the cost of baggage here: https://t.co/k1M1VSyJul If you have further questions or concerns, please send us a DM. - C

@goodaytonflyers Hi there! We do have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. If you just have general questions or concerns, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@Ella_Greene We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. - C

@Ella_Greene Hi there! Our records indicate that today's flight 2254 has been delayed until tomorrow for operational needs. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@Divababie Beautiful shot! We’d absolutely love to share this back to our followers (with proper camera cred, of course)! Reply #YesAllegiant to give us permission. Full T&C --> https://t.co/wzukGZ3ddj
@IloveElonandTe We're so sorry to hear about your situation. Please send us a private message if you need assistance from our team. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@Denaris1224 I'm sincerely sorry to hear that, Mikki. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need assistance from our team. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@justmeta Hi there! If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

PLANESPOTTERS! #SpotShotBracket is back. Last year r.a.d_photography soared to victory, but who will win this time? Submit your entries now!

☑ Tag us when you post it and add #SpotShotBracket
☑ Get ready to vote

@skylerdowns11 Hi Skyler! We're sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@there_u_r_peter Hey Peter! We do not currently service routes to/from GRR and MSY. To view our interactive route map for any alternative routes please visit: https://t.co/kPsFDtYDcE. -JH

@blessed_happily Hi there! We're so sorry to hear about this. Unfortunately, disruptions in service can occur with little notice, depending on the situation. If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@pirateguy1981 Hi Barry! Our flight crews are doing their absolute best to social distance, when possible. Unfortunately, we are unable to guarantee another passenger is not placed in your row. If you would like the reassurance of your own row, additional tickets can be purchased. -JH
@Denaris1224 We are so sorry to hear this. For assistance, send us a DM so that a member of our team can review your flight details. -JH

@Denaris1224 Our flight crews are doing their absolute best. However, it's not always possible onboard an aircraft. For this reason, customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if their flight exceeds 65% capacity. - JH

@Barbara_A_Davis We're sorry to learn of your recent travel experience. All passengers are required to wear a face mask over their mouth & nose at all times when traveling (except to briefly remove to for the consumption of food/beverages). Our team members are expected to enforce this policy. -J
@lexischlafer Hi Lexi! If in need of assistance, please send us a DM with your flight details. A member of our team would be happy to review. -JH

@DavidDa73151369 Hi David! This a great question. This is a company flight to get our aircraft from one location to another. It is not a scheduled service that we offer for sale to our customers. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@tristancaige Hello Amber! Please check your DMs. 🙂 - C
@ozer4u We are very sorry to hear that you are not satisfied. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
@Robin92788074 Hi Robin! We are sorry to hear of this negative experience. Please check your DMs. - C

@Jerod_J Hi Jerod! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. But there is good news! No need to hold. We offer complimentary baggage to military members w/ valid military/veteran ID. This is not done in advance, but rather on the day of travel. Learn more here: https://t.co/b0cZLqiLbp - C

urls.description: Free flight services and military discounts for active duty military, retired military veterans, military reserves and their families.

@c_wallaker Hi Ryan! We are sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@STFUnd_TWEET We are very sorry to hear of your travel experience. What you have stated is by no means Allegiant standards. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM so that we may review your flight details. -JH

@STFUnd_TWEET Hi there! We routinely treat all aircraft with an advanced antimicrobial protectant that kills viruses, germs and bacteria on contact for 14 days. Our treatment schedule far exceeds manufacturer guidelines. Learn more here: https://t.co/Depfqx29il - C
@ozer4u Hi Christopher! We're sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance or wish to discuss this further, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@97_BJ3 We're so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please click here to email us about missing baggage: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K If you need further assistance, please send us a DM. - C
